original: -RobCo Trespasser Management System-\n                  I-15 road control post\n===================================

translation: 目标数据已清除。谨慎行事。
钢铁兄弟会采购工程师
钢铁兄弟会采购工程师
钢铁兄弟会高级圣骑士
死去的科学工业办公室科学家

original:
Contract:

I've received a new assignment from a longstanding client back in the heartland that should be right up your alley - they want you to make an example of the targets for disturbing their business interests. They're seriously mad and want both marks as well as any further associates present silenced, and they want it done *yesterday*. There are no stipulations as for collateral damage, discretion, method of elimination - you can let your creativity run wild, the most important thing is it gets done. As for payment, give the conditions section a look for a pleasant surprise.


Details:

Target 1:
Name: Rose of Sharon Cassidy (Yeah.)
Race: Caucasian
Sex: Female

Target 2:
Name: &PCName; 
Race: &PCRace;
Sex: &PCSex;

Conditions:
Targets must be eliminated.
Our client demands proof of the targets' death as a non-negotiable clause of contract.
No advance payment. The stipulated sum of 30,000 (in words: thirty thousand) NCRD will be disbursed to your Shi bank account in Hub upon fulfillment of these conditions.

Report back to H.Q. when you're ready for another assignment.

This is a big one, so don't mess it up,
V.F.
translation:
合同:

我从腹地的一个长期客户那里接到了一项新任务，这应该是你的拿手好戏 - 他们想让你拿那些干扰他们商业利益的目标杀一儆百。他们真的生气，想让两名目标以及在场的其他同伙都闭嘴，他们想让事情“昨天”就了结。没有关于附带损害、裁量权、消除方法的规定，可以尽情发挥你的创造力，最重要的是完成它。至于付款，请查看条件部分，会有惊喜。

细节:

目标1：
名称：罗撒香·卡西迪(是的，我知道)
种族：白人
性别：女性

目标2：
名称: &PCName;
种族: &PCRace;
性别: &PCSex;

条件:

目标必须被消灭。
我们的客户要求提供目标死亡的证据这是合同中不可协商的条款
没有预付款。在满足上述条件后，按约定30000NCR币将支付至你在中枢市的始族银行账户。
当你准备好接受另一项任务时，请向总部报告。
这是件大事，所以别搞砸了。

- V.F.

original:
Contract:

A client has tendered a job equal parts risky and worthwhile. Knowing your preferences, I believe you and your squad will be more than happy to pursue it, as discretion is NOT requisite. As a matter of fact, our clients seemed uncharacteristically irate, like they're out for revenge, or perhaps scared. Do them a favor and make a real spectacle of it. They’ve set aside quite a lavish sum, see below.

Details:

Name: &PCName; 
Race: &PCRace;
Sex: &PCSex;

Conditions:

Target must be eliminated.
Our client demands proof of the target's death as a non-negotiable clause of contract.
No advance payment. The stipulated sum of 15,000 (in words: fifteen thousand) NCRD will be disbursed to your Shi Bank account in Hub upon fulfillment of these conditions.

Report back to HQ when you're ready for another assignment.

Godspeed and good hunting,
V.F.
translation:
合同:

我们的一位人脉广泛、财力雄厚的客户提供了一份风险和价值同等的工作。了解你的喜好，我相信你和你的团队会很乐意去做，因为不需要谨慎。事实上，我们的委托人似乎异常愤怒，像是要报复，或者是害怕了。帮他们个忙，把这事搞得壮观点。他们留出了一大笔钱，见下文。

细节:

名称: &PCName;
种族: &PCRace;
性别: &PCSex;

条件:

目标必须被消灭。
我们的客户要求提供目标的死亡证据这是合同中不可商量的条款。
没有预付款。在满足上述条件后，按约定15000NCR币将支付至你在中枢市的始族银行账户。
当你准备好接受另一项任务时，请向总部报告。

祝你狩猎顺利，

- V.F.

original:
Contract:

The target has supposedly acted against the business interests of a collective of powerful people over in Vegas by way of occasional killing sprees that have the tourists spooked. They're willing to pay a bounty of 4000 caps for proof of death, so I figured you might be interested. Details attached.

Details:

Name: &PCName; 
Race: &PCRace;
Sex: &PCSex;

Conditions:

Target must be eliminated.
Our client demands proof of the target's death as a non-negotiable clause of contract.
No advance payment. The stipulated sum of 4000 (in words: four thousand) caps will be disbursed to you in cash upon fulfillment of these conditions.

Report back to H.Q. as soon as you’re ready for another mission.

Sounds like you're going up against an actual maniac here, so best bring your A game.
Godspeed and good hunting,
V.F.
translation:
合同:

据推测，目标的行为违背了维加斯一群有权有势的人的商业利益，因为他偶尔会大肆杀戮，这让游客们感到害怕。他们愿意出四千瓶盖的赏金来换取目标死亡的证据，所以我想你可能会感兴趣。附上详细资料。

细节:

名称: &PCName;
种族: &PCRace;
性别: &PCSex;

条件：

目标必须被消灭。
我们的客户要求提供目标的死亡证据，这是合同中不可协商的条款。
没有预付款。在满足上述条件后，约定的4000(瓶盖将以现金支付给你方。

当你准备好接受另一项任务时，请向总部报告。

听起来你要面对的是一个真正的疯子，所以拿出最好的表现。
祝你一路顺风，狩猎顺利。

- V.F.

original:
My contacts have confirmed to me that in all likelihood it was the Courier known as &PCName; who launched the missile at I-15. I know you inquired because this is a personal matter to you. After all we've been through together, let me once again express my deepest sympathy for your loss. Obviously this one is on the house.

Now make that genocidal motherfucker suffer.
V.F.
translation:
我的联系人已经向我证实，极有可能是被称为&PCName; 的邮差在15号高速公路上投下了核弹。我知道你询问是因为这是你的私事，在我们一起经历了这么多之后，让我再次对你的损失表示最深切的同情，显然这是免费的。

现在让那个种族灭绝的混蛋尝尝苦头吧。

- V.F.

original:
< The writing is smeared, as though the mutant great effort to put it to paper >
he r name was Caroline 
a nd she loved u very mu ch

For her 6 birth day you 
bak ed her a cake with 
pink ice ing and
translation:
<文字被涂抹了，这个变种人好像费了很大的力气才把它写在纸上>

她 的名字叫卡罗琳
她非 常爱你

为了她6岁的生日你
给她 烤了个蛋糕
粉色的 冰和

original:
CLASSIFIED - OSI AND AUTHORIZED NCR MILITARY PERSONNEL ONLY 

MISSION PARAMETERS FOR:
Dr. Randall Behan

In order to commence cultivation of larger quantities and controlled testing of the recently obtained (REDACTED) you are to accompany a guarded caravan transporting a sample to the New Reno office to ensure proper handling during the transfer, as well as providing general assistance to the New Reno team in initiating the aforementioned procedures. This will occur in parallel to the other sample transfers to designated OSI locations in (REDACTED) and (REDACTED), as referred to in the respective briefing documents.
You are to hand over the sample in its provided safety container, a password-protected lambda-class receptacle placed within an inconspicuous wooden box. As per standard protocol, it is rigged to rapidly release its aerosol content and self-detonate if tampered with. Do note that for this reason the container is to remain sealed for the duration of your journey. The password to defuse its safety mechanism will have been transmitted to the New Reno office by the time you arrive.
You are to prioritize the safety of the sample above all else. You are not to disclose the contents to anyone besides your contact at the New Reno office. Violation of these instructions may lead to legal persecution in accordance to the Federal Intelligence Act of 2277. Following the successful transfer and initiation of the aforementioned procedures in the New Reno office, you are to make your way back to McCarran and await further instructions.
translation:
机密 - 仅限科技工业办公室和授权的NCR军事人员

任务指令：

兰德尔·贝汉博士

为了开始更大数量的种植并开始对最近获得的（已编辑）进行受控测试，您将陪同一个有守卫的商队将样品运送到新里诺办公室，确保在转移过程中得到适当的处理，并为新里诺团队负责启动上述程序。这将与其他样本转移到（已编辑）和（已编辑）中指定的OSI地点并行发生，如各自的简报文件中所述。

你将把样本交到它提供的安全容器中，一个受密码保护的（已编辑）级别的安全容器，放置在一个不起眼的木箱中，它被改装成能迅速释放气溶胶成分，一旦被篡改就会自动引爆。请注意，由于这个原因，集装箱在你的旅程中必须保持密封。在你到达之前，拆除安全装置的密码应该已经传到了新里诺办公室。

你必须把样品的安全放在首位。除了你在新里诺办公室的联系人之外，不得将内容透露给任何人。根 2277年NCR联邦情报法，违反这些指示可能会导致法律制裁。
在新里诺办公室成功交接并启动上述程序后，你将返回麦卡伦营地等待进一步指示。

original:
CLASSIFIED - AUTHORIZED EYES ONLY

MISSION PARAMETERS FOR: SIGMA SQUAD

You are to infiltrate the Vegas area and enact acts of sabotage against the Legion's occupying force as well as its supporters in order to demoralize the enemy and impede their progress in subjugating the territory. Particular emphasis is to be placed on the disruption of enemy supply lines, assassination of high-ranking enemy combatants and support of local anti-Legion insurgents.
You are to aid remaining NCR forces or citizens in any way you deem appropriate and feasible. This mission is not officially sanctioned by the NCR government; accordingly, you are not bound by NCR law whilst operating on Legion-occupied territory and are guaranteed full amnesty of any acts in violation thereof.
You can contact your handler via radio from a designated NCR safe house, the location of which will be transmitted to you before your departure. You are to report back every two weeks. Should you fail to uphold this procedure, you will be deemed MIA and your contract will be declared void until proven otherwise.
translation:
机密 - 仅限授权查看

任务参数:西格玛小队

你要潜入维加斯地区，对军团占领军及其支持者实施破坏行动，以打击敌人的士气，阻碍他们征服该地区的进程。特别强调的是破坏敌方补给线，暗杀敌方高级战斗人员和支持当地反军团叛乱分子。

你们要以任何你们认为适当可行的方式援助留在NCR的部队或公民。这项任务没有得到NCR政府的正式批准;因此，当你在军团占领的领土上行动时，你不受NCR法律的约束，并保证对任何违反该法律的行为给予完全赦免。

你可以在指定的NCR安全屋通过无线电联系你的联络人，安全屋的位置会在你离开前发送给你。你必须每两周回来报告一次。如果你没有遵守这一程序，你将被视为战斗失踪人员，你的合同将被宣布无效，直到有其他证明。

original:
<The note is hard to read, as many words are crossed out and smudged, as if written by a child >

hi jenn did the maf traffic runnin dry on i1 5 and hi way 9 5 a real cluster fuck thanks to the prison break so ur gunna need to charge more or well be outa caps be fore the years out . . gonna need to increase the tol by half til charlie gets his new conter fightin op goin out east at lake meead and we others find a better spot to set up camp
anyway 5 0 caps for adults and 3 0 for kidz shuld cover it shake down traders for xtra suplies as well if any pass tru could use us alls we can get
if they dont have caps take whatevr else they got and run em of but dont kill em less they make truble cant use bounti hunters and viggilantehs comin aftr our ass again

sis have a little fait and pay shence i know i know times is hard but i hav big dream and am determinated and i think all of u do a great job! i know if we make it tru tis dry streek aint gona be a grreter gang in all of vegas remember long as we stick togever well be fine reno kids are hard to kill

ps. re member to stash the caps in the safe hous west of your camp from now on ,,gonna chek by tere evry other day also watch out for NCR word is they dont gone that far norf no more but betr sayf then sory

X dan
translation:
<笔记很难读，因为很多字被划掉和弄脏了，看起来像是孩子写的>

嗨，珍，15号公路和95号高速公路的交通状况很糟糕，多亏了越狱，真是一群混蛋。所以你得多收点钱，否则我们会在几年后完蛋的。我们得把通行费增加一半直到查理在米德湖找到他的新作战计划，我们其他人找到一个更好的地方扎营。

无论如何，成人50瓶盖，儿童30瓶盖应该够了，如果有通行证，我们可以额外再拿点。

如果他们没有瓶盖，拿走他们所有的东西，把他们赶走，但不要杀他们，否则他们会制造麻烦，不能再让赏金猎人和义务警员来追杀我们。

我知道我知道，这段时间是艰难的，但我有伟大的梦想和决心，我认为你们所有人都做得很好！我知道如果我们能做到这一点，整个维加斯就不会有比我们更好的帮派，记住只要我们团结在一起就会好起来，新里诺的孩子没那么容易被杀死。

附：请记住，从现在开始，把瓶盖藏在营地西边的安全屋里，每隔一天就会去检查，还要注意NCR的消息，他们不会真的走那么远，只是说不知道。

- X丹

original:
Heya Dan,

You were right about this place, it's just what we needed! We're done setting up and already sent a message to Sue and her folks to pack it up over at the old Sarsaparilla factory. Believe me, we'll be raking in tons of caps in no time!
There's no way McLafferty's people will catch a whiff of us out here in the boonies, and some creepy hicks to the south keep us supplied with fresh Lakelurk meat in exchange for a cut of our product - they're dumb hillbilly trash, so not worried about them realizing we're just giving them compression-molded scrap, ha!
When that Courier Sue is banging shows up, I'll have him deliver you a little sample of our work along with this letter - 150 caps, to be exact, best check, fella skeeves me out. 
Anyway hope your Omerta buddies like them, they were a bitch to produce. Without real machinery production's slower than it used to be, but at least out here we won't have to worry about any crazed old robots or NCR thugs.
By the way, there's been some Cazadores creeping in lately. So far a little dynamite was enough to keep 'em at bay, but I'd rather have a permanent solution. Think you can organize us some bug spray? Or a flamethrower?

Tell Jenn I said hi and take care, bro!

Charlie
translation:
你好，丹，

你说对了，这个地方正是我们所需要的！我们已经布置完成并已经向苏珊和她在旧夕阳沙士工厂的家人们发送了信息，让他们收拾东西赶紧过来，相信我，我们很快就会收获成吨的瓶盖！
在这么远的地方不必担心麦克拉弗蒂的人，南方的一些渔民为我们提供新鲜的湖沼蟹肉以换取我们的一些产品 - 愚蠢的乡巴佬垃圾，所以不用担心他们意识到我们给他们的只是压缩成型的废品，哈！
当苏珊的那个邮差出现时，我会让他把我们工作的一小部分样本连同这封信一起寄给你--准确地说，150瓶盖，最好检查一下，不要太相信那个人。
希望你的黑手党朋友喜欢它们，他们生产起来真不容易。没有任何真正的机器，生产速度比以前慢，但至少在这里我们不必担心什么疯狂的旧机器人或NCR暴徒。反正造假只是一个实践问题。
顺便说一下，最近有一些猎蜂爬到了这个地区。到目前为止，一点炸药就足以阻止他们，但我希望有一个永久的解决方案。你能给我们组织一些杀虫剂吗？或者火焰喷射器？
代我向珍问好，保重，兄弟！

- 查理

original: Friends, we have some more vermin to take care of, and this time it's personal.\nRemember &PCName;, that courier old Doc Mitchell brought back from the dead in Goodsprings? Well, turns out that very same Courier helped the Powder Gang take over the town and slaughter nearly everyone in it soon after. We can and will not just stand idly by while good folks get pushed around! How about we grab our guns and go out for some hunting? It's about time this hoodlum received a lesson in wasteland justice and gets put back in their rightful place - the grave!
translation: 朋友们，我们还有更多害虫要处理，这次是私人恩怨。\n\n还记得那个叫 &PCName; 的邮差吗？那个被老米切尔医生从死里复活的人。结果就是那个邮差帮助炸药帮占领了清泉镇然后很快屠杀了几乎所有人。我当好人受人摆布时，我们不能也不会袖手旁观！我们拿起枪，出去打猎怎么样？现在是时候让这个流氓接受废土正义的教训，让他回到他应该待的地方——坟墓！

original:
As per our agreement I poked around what remains standing of Primm. It is a massacre. With the state of affairs around the area, my first assumption was Powder Gangers, or perhaps Jackals, but further investigations quickly revealed this wasn't their handywork, on account of the former decomposing on the streets and the latter being fully absent in any way, shape or form. I sifted through Mojave Express' files to check if any Couriers left town before things went south, and would you believe it? &PCName;, a.k.a. "Courier 6", was one of the last people to check in with the office in order to pick up a delivery. It seems as though disaster follows in their track, like their very name is a bad omen. Perhaps this courier is more than just a harmless mailman with disastrous timing...
My business here is concluded and I can't prove the courier's direct involvement in what happened to this town - or Hopeville. But if I had to take a guess... well, let's say I know who my prime suspect is.

Be cautious and happy hunting!

~ From the office of Alethia Prayne, private investigator.
translation:
你不会相信，但我确实是对的！我在普瑞姆废墟周围探查了一下。正如我所怀疑的那样，这是一场大屠杀。根据这些地方的情况，我的第一个假设是炸药帮，或者可能是豺狼帮，但我很快意识到这不是他们的手法，因为前者在街上腐烂，而后者完全没有任何组织。所以我查看了莫哈维邮件公司的文件，检查是否有任何邮差在事情发生之前离开了城镇，你相信吗， &PCName; 是最后一个向他们报到的人之一。没错， &PCName; 又名“6号邮差”，来这里送过东西。听起来很熟悉吧？似乎无论这个名字出现在哪里，灾难都会接踵而至，就像是不祥之兆。或者，也许这个邮差不仅仅是一个无害的邮递员...

我在这里的事情已经结束了，我无法证明邮差直接参与了发生在这个城镇或黎明镇的事情。但如果要我猜的话...好吧，我知道我的主要嫌疑人是谁。

在外面要小心，祝狩猎愉快！

- 来自私家侦探阿莱西亚·普瑞恩的办公室。

original:
Got another assignment for y’all. Some wasteland assholes want another wasteland asshole by name of &PCName; sixed for various crimes committed against some Mojave shithole or other yada yada yada, here's the interesting bit: a successful kill will net you no less than a 700 cap reward if you can bring in their head in a recognizable state. 
Deal? Good. They want to hear good news by the end of the month. Manage to do that and I can get you some of them star caps you been after to sweeten the pot.

Happy hunting,
Clyde
translation:
还有一项任务要交给你。一些废土混蛋想要另一个叫&PCName;的人死。因为他在莫哈维的某个鬼地方犯下了各种各样的罪行。还是老样子，有趣的是：如果你能把他的脑袋以可辨认的状态带回来，成功击杀后你将获得不少于700瓶盖的报酬。

狩猎快乐，
- 克莱德

original:
Contract:

An influential client from the New Vegas Strip has deigned to reach out beyond their fancy walls and grace us desert peasants with a rather lucrative assignment. The target is to be considered dangerous and "discourteous", which I understand to be moneybag for "heavily armed and pissed off". Luckily, they're not only lacking in clarity of expression, but also have potential for growth vis-a-vis their business acumen - I was able to fleece them of quite a hefty sum in exchange for our services - a simple hit job. Details attached.

Details:

Name: &PCName; 
Race: &PCRace;
Sex: &PCSex;

Conditions:

Target must be eliminated - discreetly so if possible, but as usual that's your call, client is hardly going to complain so long as the job gets done.
Our client demands proof of the target's death as a non-negotiable clause of contract.
No advance payment. The stipulated sum of 20,000 (in words: twenty thousand) NCRD will be disbursed to your Shi bank account in Hub upon fulfillment of these conditions.

Report back to H.Q. when you're ready for another mission.

Godspeed and make these decadent clowns happy,
V.F.
translation:
合同:

一位来自新维加斯长街的有影响力的客户已经屈尊从他们华丽的墙壁后面伸出手来给我们这些沙漠农民一个相当有利可图的任务。目标是要被认为是危险的和“无礼的”，我理解为“全副武装且愤怒”的钱袋子。幸运的是，他们不仅缺乏清晰的表达，而且相对于他们的商业头脑，他们还有增长的潜力。我能够从他们那里敲诈一大笔钱，以换取我们的服务——一个简单的击杀工作。详情附上。

细节:

名称: &PCName; 
种族: &PCRace; 
性别: &PCSex; 

条件:

目标必须被消灭 - 如果可能的话，谨慎地这样做，但通常这由你决定，只要工作完成，客户就不会抱怨。
我们的委托人要求提供目标死亡的证据，这是合同中不可协商的条款。
没有预付款。在满足上述条件后，我们将按照约定将20,000NCR币转到你在中枢市的始族银行账户。
当你准备好执行另一个任务时，向总部报告。

祝你狩猎顺利，

- V.F.

original:
From the office of Tiaret Van Graff.

Marcel,

Let me commence this letter by making clear to you that I do not wish to hear your condolences - in fact, I don't want you to ever mention Glory and Jean-Baptiste's names to me again. We all know the risks this business brings with it. Every day we face this abyss, regardless of the precautions we devise to keep it at bay. Nothing can and will ever change that.
However, while we are still in this world, while we are still walking, the most important thing there is, is family. And while we still can fight back, we *must* ensure the annihilation of anyone who poses a threat to our own; and more importantly yet, we *must* defend our family's honor and reputation.
That is why I want you to track that murderer and everyone with them down and end them all. Painfully, slowly and for the world to see. Make them suffer for what they did to my children and let everyone know what happens when you cross the Van Graffs. Then, once they are dead, you will track down all of their closest relatives and cull their bloodline. It may take you weeks, perhaps months, but you will ensure our name will never be uttered without fear and reverence again.

Regards.
translation:
来自蒂亚雷特·范·格拉夫的办公室。

马塞尔,

在这封信的开头，我要明确地告诉你，我不希望听到你的哀悼——事实上，我不希望你再向我提起格洛丽亚和让·巴普蒂斯特的名字。

我们都知道这行业的风险，我们每天都面对这个深渊，无论我们采取什么预防措施来阻止它。没有什么可以也永远不会改变这一点。

然而，当我们还在这个世界上，当我们还在行走的时候，最重要的事情就是，家族。当我们仍有能力反击时，我们*必须*确保绝对消灭任何对我们自己构成威胁的人，更重要的是，我们必须捍卫家族的荣誉和声誉。

所以我要让你追查那个凶手和所有跟他们在一起的人，把他们都干掉。痛苦地，慢慢地，让全世界都看到。让他们为对我孩子所做的事付出代价，让所有人知道玷污范·格拉夫家族的名声会有什么下场。等他们死后，我要你追踪到他们所有的近亲并剔除他们的血统。这可能会花费你几周，甚至几个月的时间，但你将确保范·格拉夫家族的名字永远不会在没有恐惧和崇敬的情况下被提起。

此致。

original:
Day 228:

Killed 3 Powder Gangers not far from Goodsprings. Hopefully worth more than the last batch. Took 'em out from quite a distance. Still a decent shot despite fucked-up shoulder.

Day 232:

Picked up bounty from Sheriff in Primm and procuredsome canned goods and ammo from Nash.

Day 235:
 
Ben spotted 2 BoS Paladins heading south on the train tracks near Sloan around 9 PM. Trying to avoid detection by Powder Gang, it seems. Been following them at a distance for two hours, unnoticed so far. Ain't seen any Tin Cans since Lost Hills, but a welcome change from pussy ex-cons who can barely fend for themselves. Waiting for them to take a break so we can lay down mines and prepare an attack. Time to get our hands on a nice new suit of armor.

Entry 237: 

Got them in the early morning. Tin Cans sat down at campsite near what's left of Nipton to take a rest till sunrise. Put down pulse mines all over tracks heading towards the border and each took position on surrounding hills to pincer them. First one got fried in PA, shot second through armor joints with AP rounds while Ben flanked him, then tracked blood trail when he took off, just like back in the war. Didn't make it 100 yards before bleeding out. First suit destroyed by EMP, Ben agreed to leave second one to me, just need to wash the blood out. Servos seem busted and fusion core is close to depleted, so don't think I'll be keeping it for very long. NCR might be interested in buying, Oliver likes to dress his boys up in disabled suits. Fucking deathtraps.
Don't matter. We won. Didn't bring Juliet back, but still feelt damn good. 

Read their orders too, were sent to investigate some sort of pre-war space satellite that went down near Nipton. Interesting, might wanna go and take a closer look. For now just gonna set up camp on the hills and lay the carcasses out on train tracks alongside GPS tracker. Wait if more BoS come looking for their friends. Might not kill them outright, rather track 'em to where they live.
translation:
第228天:

在清泉镇附近干掉了三个炸药帮，希望他们比上一批值钱一点。从很远的地方就把他们干掉了，虽然肩膀受伤了，但枪法还不错。

第232天:

从普瑞姆警长那里得到了赏金，然后在纳什那儿买了罐头和弹药。

第235天:

晚上9点左右，本在斯隆附近的铁路上发现了2个钢铁兄弟会圣骑士在往南走。看起来是为了躲避炸药帮的侦查。我远远地跟着他们两个小时了，没人注意到。从失落山丘之后我就没见这些铁罐头了，不过这是个可喜的改变，不再是那些只能勉强养活自己的娘娘腔。等他们休息一下，我们就可以埋下地雷，准备进攻。是时候弄一套漂亮的新盔甲了。

第237天:

一大早就找到他们了。铁罐头坐在尼普顿遗迹附近的露营地休息，直到日出。在通往边境的轨道上布满脉冲地雷，每个人都在周围的山上就位，夹击它们。第一个人被炸了，第二个在本的夹击下被穿甲弹打穿了装甲关节，然后在他逃走时追踪血迹，就像在战争中一样。还没跑到100码就失血而死。第一套动力甲被电磁脉冲给破坏了，本同意把第二套给我，只需要把血迹洗掉。伺服器好像坏掉了，核聚变核心也快耗尽了，估计我也养不了多久。NCR可能会有兴趣购买，奥利弗喜欢让他的孩子们穿有缺陷的套装。该死的死亡陷阱。

不重要，我们赢了。虽然不能让朱丽叶死而复生，但感觉还是很好。

我也读了他们的命令，他们被派去调查在尼普顿附近坠落的某种战前太空卫星。有意思，也许哪天我会想去仔细看看。现在我们要在山上扎营把尸体放在铁轨上和GPS追踪器放在一起。等着看是否有更多的兄弟会成员来找他们的朋友。也许我不会直接杀了它们，而是跟着它们，找到它们的老巢。

original: Crimson Caravans caught wind of our operation, pack your shit and get moving before their thugs show up. Dan told me about an abandoned shack north of Lake Mead, a few clicks east of Jenn’s outpost. Place already has the essentials set up, so I guess that's where we're headed. Grab all the caps and raw materials you can carry and shake a fucking leg, okay? We need all hands on deck up here, so order that Courier friend of yours to come right back, need to loop Dan in. Good luck and see you around!\n\nCharlie
translation:
深红商队发现了我们的行动，收拾好你的东西，在他们的手下出现之前赶紧离开。丹告诉我米德湖以北有个废弃的棚屋，就在珍的前哨站以东几公里处，那里已经准备好了必需品，所以我猜我们现在要去那里。

带上所有你能拿上的瓶盖和原材料赶紧跑路。我们需要所有人齐心协力，所以让你的邮差朋友也马上回来，把丹也拉进来。祝你好运，再见！

- 查理

original:
Dan, I'm sorry. Couldn't protect your brother like I promised. Damned bugs came outta nowhere, chasing after that Courier Susan's been hiring to move the goods. Little cur almost made it in, but was too slow, died just close enough so they could spot us. Bugs was swarming all over the place, tried to barricade the doors, but fuckers came through the roof.  They were too fast and too many to fend off, so I made for the basement. Charlie got stung. Ain't nothin I coulda done for him, I'm sorry.
Now ever body’s gone, and I can hear the Cazadores up there, chewing on the door, crawling round the house, waitin on me. Only one bullet left. Talk bout a hint of fate. Ain't no way I'll make it through them, so gon end things on my own terms.
Don't feel bad for leading us here. Couldnt a known. You pulled me out that ditch in Reno back then and always was a brother to me. Toiled just as hard as us mopes out here to make it big one day. Ain’t enough folks like you and that’s what ails this sick joke of a world. 
Now I got nothin left to write. Thanks for ever thing, pardner. Gonna buy you a round in the great corall up there.

Pete
translation:
丹，我很抱歉，没能像我承诺的那样保护你的兄弟。该死的虫子不知从哪儿冒出来，追着苏珊雇来搬运货物的快递员。小杂种差点就进来了，但是速度太慢了，死在了离我们很近的地方，虫子才发现了我们。它们到处都是，试图把门堵住，但混蛋们从屋顶钻了进来。它们速度太快，数量太多，我无法抵挡，所以我逃进了地下室。查理被蜇了，我什么都做不了，抱歉。

现在所有人都完了，我可以听到猎蜂在上面咬门，在房子周围爬来爬去，在等我。
只剩下一颗子弹了，这是命运的暗示，我不可能渡过难关了，所以我要以我自己的方式结束一切。
别因为带我们到这里而感到自责，不可能预知的。你把我从里诺的那条沟里拉了出来，你一直是我的兄弟。和我们这些游手好闲的家伙一起辛苦工作，只为有一天出人头地。像你这样的人还不够多，这就是这个鬼世界的症结所在。

现在我没什么可写的了。谢谢你做的一切，伙计。我请你到那边的大酒吧去喝一杯。

- 皮特

original:
Picked this ledger off some dumbass Brahmin driver who wanted to play hero. Figured keeping log would provide a bit of mental stimulation, lest the sun or dealing with these dimwits all day fries what's left of my brain.
Anyway. Gotta get my thoughts in order, getting hard to recall shit sometimes. Name's Jon Murphy, disgraced NCR Ranger. Consider this my confession. 

After Searchlight I shirked an early pension 'cause I figured I was still fit to work and had some anti-discrimination laws backing my case, "partial disability", "reintegration into service", the works. Went alright till I realized they wanted to keep me off the battlefield all the way to pension age. No honor in being an honorary Ranger anyway, so started turning some extracurricular bucks on the side. Brass wasn't so fond of that, so here I am. 

P.S.: best make sure I'm dead. Might just look it, motherfucker.

Day 4
Been a bit over a week now since I "dishonorably discharged" myself. That bitch Boyd always was suspicious of me, guess one of those snitch-ass grunts tipped her off.
Anyway, barely dodged the MPs that night and snuck out of camp. So much for that pension, ha-ha. Things ain't all bad though, was prepared after all. 
Met Joey at the designated spot, most of his guys made it out via the monorail. Alvarez and King are also there, and a handful of the usual suspects. Joey's useful enough for a farm boy, pragmatic, strong, hates the army and most of all he's a hopeless fucking addict, though he don't wanna admit it to himself. He'll do whatever I tell him so long as I keep him supplied. Seems a little shaken up over the way things went down, but has to keep it together for his guys and a lack of alternatives. He'll come around.
Anyway, quickly convinced them we'll need to garner up more caps to get outta Vegas and keep my suppliers happy and generous, so started using our uniforms and well-learned all-official NCR talk to get the caravans to cough up a "road toll". Works real wonders... barring the very dead gentleman who bequeathed me this book.

Day 7
Either people are losing their respect for the military, or the caravans are wising up. They don't carry as many caps anymore, one straight up refused to pay us. Put a serious beating on him, which convinced him. 
We keep having to dodge troops pouring into the area as well. Are they looking for me? Rogue Rangers are bad PR, even when they're decrepit zombies. Or maybe it's the Legion? Wish I had my radio with me, wouldn't wanna stick around for when they hit. 

Day 8
Like I didn't have enough shit on my plate, Joey’s starting to get uppity. Keeps on bitching about the heat, the cold, the people we killed, says we're traitors and need to "face justice". Like it’s my fault we're in this mess you jethead cunt.
I don't fancy a summary execution, so he needs to have an accident. Trouble is, some of these boneheads really like him. When push comes to shove, they’d rather side with their old brother in arms, even if the alternative is 5 to the chest on McCarran courtyard. God, my head is killing me.

Day 9
Seems luck is still on my side. Ran into a bunch of stingy Prospectors today; said we're too ragged to be NCR, they’d never seen a zombie in uniform before, same old. They didn't last long. Joey took a slug to the gut though, coughing up blood, losing consciousness. His boys insisted on dragging him back to camp, but I say he won't last another day. Lucky!

Day 11
Smoothskin motherfucker refuses to die and worse yet, Alvirez keeps him flying with MY STASH OF JET!! so he don't get withdrawals while he's out. Gotta admit, he almost reminds me of myself, dragging my irradiated ass out of Searchlight against all odds - but on the other hand I'd rather not have that little fuckstick back on his feet to go tattling to Boyd first chance he gets or turn on me outright. Still haven't used up all the Psycho, can think of a good alternate use.

Day 12
Buried Joey a ways off from camp. His guys seem shaken up for the time being, but by now they've gotten used to losing friends. Seems no one suspects a thing, 'sides Alvirez, but she's too cur to make a move. Far as they're concerned, I'm the undisputed leader. Nobody fucks with me.
We should get a move on ASAP. Things are heating up in Vegas and I can feel NCR’s breath down my peeling neck. We splashed out too many caps on chems, so need to hit one more caravan before heading up north. Heard stories about this place called Zion - ought to be far enough from Legion and republic to turn over a new leaf. Just need make sure I can keep these fools drugged-up and happy. Goddamn headache again. Haven't slept in days.
translation:
我从一个想当英雄的愚蠢婆罗门牛车夫那里拿到了这本书。我想把我们的行动记录下来会带来一些精神刺激，以免太阳或者整天和这些笨蛋打交道会把我剩下的大脑炸得粉碎，我可不想变得野性。

总之，我得整理一下思绪，有时候什么都想不起来了。我叫乔恩·墨菲，名誉扫地的NCR游骑兵，这是我的告白。

在探照灯事件之后，我逃避了提前领取养老金，因为我认为我仍然适合工作，并且有一些反歧视法支持我的案例，“部分残疾”，“重新融入服务”，等等。一开始一切顺利，直到我意识到他们想让我远离战场一直到退休年龄。作为一个荣誉游骑兵和摆弄文件的人没有什么荣誉可言，所以我开始赚一些外快。高层不喜欢这样，所以我现在在这里了。

附言：最好确保我死了。看看就知道了，混蛋。


第一天

我自己“不光彩退伍”以来已经有3天多了。傻逼博伊德一直在怀疑我，我猜是那些告密的家伙给她通风报信了。不管怎么说，那天晚上勉强躲过了宪兵，偷偷溜出了营地。退休金就到此为止了，哈哈。也不全是坏事，毕竟我已经准备好了。

在指定地点遇见了乔伊，他的手下大部分人都通过单轨列车逃出了营地，毫发无伤，没人注意到。阿尔瓦雷斯和金也在那里，还有其他一些人也被我的东西迷住了。乔伊作为一个农场男孩来说很有用，务实，强壮，讨厌军队，最重要的是，他是个无可救药的瘾君子，尽管他还不想承认。只要我有足够的杰特，他就会照我说的做。他似乎对事情的发展方式有些震惊，但他的人必须团结起来，而且别无选择。

呃，他最终会改变主意的。

总之，我很快说服了他们，我们需要收集更多的瓶盖才能离开维加斯，让我的供应商高兴和慷慨，所以开始用我们的制服和娴熟的官方NCR谈话技巧让商队支付“公路通行费”。在很大程度上，这真的很神奇，我猜，尤其对于之前拥有这本账簿的那个孩子来说...


第七天

要么是人们失去了对军队的尊重，要么是商队开始变得明智起来。他们不再带着那么多瓶盖了，甚至有一个人直接拒绝付钱给我们，还失去了一个去拿瓶盖的人。而且似乎有更多的军队涌入了该地区，越来越难以躲避巡逻队。他们在找我吗？毕竟，流氓游骑兵是一门糟糕的生意，即使是那些在训练中作弊的老朽僵尸。
还是因为军团的原因？要是我有时间带着我的收音机就好了，他们来的时候我可不想呆在这儿。


第八天

好像我的事还不够多似的，乔伊开始生气了。一直抱怨天气太热，太冷，我们杀的人，说我们是叛徒，要接受审判？说我们陷入困境都是我的错，当着我的面说我是蛇，那个混蛋。
我得杀了他，他迟早会供出我们，我可不喜欢草率处决。
麻烦的是，其他一些白痴真的很喜欢他。当情况危急时，他们宁愿站在自己的老大哥一边，也不愿站在一些穿着游骑兵装备的臭僵尸一边，即使另一种选择的结局是在麦卡伦院子里挨上5枪。天啊，我的头要痛死了。


第九天

看来运气还是站在我这边。今天遇到一群小气的淘金客，说我们看起来衣衫褴褛，不可能是真正的 NCR，他们以前从未见过穿制服的僵尸。试图抵抗，但没坚持多久。乔伊胸口挨了一枪，咳血，失去了知觉。他的手下坚持要把他拖回营地，但我觉得他可能活不过一天了。幸运！而且，那些废土混蛋身上还带着疯狂药。


第十一天

那个顽固的滑皮混蛋仍然不肯死，甚至看起来在好转，那个婊子阿尔维雷斯让他磕我的杰特！！这样他就不会出现戒断症状。不得不承认，他的固执让我想起了我自己，从探照灯里拖着被辐射的屁股。另一方面，我可不想让那个小混蛋重新站起来，他会一有机会就跑回博伊德身边，或者直接对我下手。还没用完的疯狂药，可以想出一个不错的替代用途。只需要和他单独待一会儿。


第十二天
把乔伊埋在离营地很远的地方。他手下的人暂时看起来很震惊，但现在他们已经习惯了失去朋友。似乎没人怀疑什么，除了阿尔维雷斯，但她太卑鄙了，不敢行动。在他们看来，我是无可争议的领袖，没人敢惹我。

我们应该尽快行动起来，维加斯的局势越来越紧张，我能感觉到NCR的气息顺着我脱皮的脖子往下吹。我们在化学药品上花了太多的钱，所以在北上之前需要再打劫一个商队。听说有个叫锡安的地方，离军团和共和国应该够远了，可以改过自新，我只需要确保我能让这群蠢货开心地嗑药就行了。又头疼了，已经好几天没睡觉了。

original: Share a whiskey with me sometime?
{Random}It's amazing what passes for a firearm around here. You'd be better off throwing rocks.
translation: {Random}这么好的枪都不买，我看你还是拿石头砸人吧。

original: {Default}Demand for Gun Runner weapons is high, so don't expect them to stay in stock for very long.
translation: {Default}军火贩子的武器供不应求，错过了可就没有了。

original: Got any rocks then? Or other forms of armamament?
translation: 那么，有石头吗？还是你有其他武器？

original: < Motions you to show your items. >
You should have been with us in our glory days. You'd have loved it.
translation: 你真该跟我们一起经历那些光辉岁月。你会爱上那一切的。

original: You got any chems to spare?
I'm looking to buy some chems.

translation: 埃尔·多拉多服务加油站
内华达高速公路服务站
克拉马斯·鲍勃的饮品店
讨价还价哈利的连锁超市
埃尔·多拉多服务加油站
